DOC.brief_summary: The main aim study determine whether difference physiological effect theobromine provide via single serving compare multiple serving add amount theobromine provide day . This study also aim study pharmacokinetics theobromine administration per day versus administration 4 time per day . Hypothesis : effect heart rate less pronounced high dose theobromine give 4 small dos .
DOC.brief_title: The Acute Effect 2 Different Serving Regimens Theobromine Physiological Effects
DOC.criteria: Apparently healthy men postmenopausal woman : medical condition might affect study measurement ( judge study physician ) Age 4070 year BMI ≥ 18 ≤ 30 kg/m2 Blood pressure , heart rate , haematological clinical chemical parameter within normal reference range judge non clinically significant research physician Written inform consent Previous cardiovascular event ( ) ( stroke , TIA , angina , myocardial infarction , heart failure ) Diabetes mellitus Reported weight loss gain 10 % body weight period 6 month prior screen Reported intense sporting activity > 10 h/week Use overthe counter prescribe medication may interfere study measurement , judge physician Use antibiotic three month screen runin period . Currently smoke nonsmoker le 6 month report use nicotine containing product 6 month precede study study High caffeine consumption : report consumption 8 cups/cans caffeinecontaining drink per day , i.e . coffee , black green tea cola ( also cola light , diet & zero ) OR consumption 1 energy drink per day
